titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the recognition of March 10, 2022, as "Abortion Provider Appreciation Day".
A concurrent resolution expressing support for the recognition of March 10, 2022, as "Abortion Provider Appreciation Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution recognizes March 10, 2022, as Abortion Provider Appreciation Day.
